title: Who is the oldest band still performing? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Australian band, “The Seekers” (of ‘Georgy Girl’ and ‘I’ll Never Find Another You’ fame), first performed December 3rd, 1962 in Melbourne, and consisted of Athol Guy (Vocals, Double Bass, Bass Guitar), Keith Potger (Vocals, 12 String Guitar, Guitar and 5 String Banjo), Bruce Woodley (Vocals, Guitar, 5 String Banjo and Mandolin) and Judith Durham (Vocals and Piano). However, unlike some bands that still perform today with few, if any, original members (The Beach Boys, for example), the original members of The Seekers continued to perform and tour right up to a few years ago, long enough to do their Golden Anniversary tour to celebrate the 50 years since their first performance together in a Melbourne coffee house. Some 57 years later, Athol, Keith and Bruce continue to perform today as The Seekers with a replacement for Judith, whose health prevents her from touring.
